website_summaries.verdict: Mirror and screen includes some slick features like a compass and temperature control, but does not include the camera.
pros: Includes an auto dimming feature to help the mirror adjust to the surrounding lighting
Temperature and compass display on the screen
Guidelines are adjustable to fit for your vehicle
Looks like a normal rearview mirror when not in operation
cons: The installation on this rearview mirror is a bit more complicated than others on the market
It also does not include the actual camera

customer_reviews.title: BEST LCD!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried multiple mirror LCDs. Yes I had to install all of them. Very painful because I was not happy with quality of all of them. The LCDs were very difficult to see during the day and at night mirrors had a weird glare. I decided to try this Mirror because of the advertised super brightness LCD. I was very pleased with this mirror! Don’t waste your money on anything else. The LCD is the best I’ve looked at and have tried. Mirror is auto dimming at night and functions as an OEM type mirror. Looks OEM as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband for Christmas and we had it installed. The item itself has been amazing!... until it stopped working today, less that 3 weeks after Christmas. It no longer shows the screen when in reverse, and it doesn’t show temperature or direction anymore either. We are extremely disappointed. Spent $190 on this unit, $80 dollars on a Pioneer camera and install wasn’t cheap either. Now we need to have it checked out to find out why it has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Christy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. Easy install. Although it talks about calibrating the unit, i didn't need to being in Arizona. Once I have a little more time I will. I also have a head unit that has a reverse camera input. I simply put in a Y adapter to split the signal so that both show the rear camera. I also plugged the video IN to the mirror into the video out of the head unit. So when a movie is being shown it appears there as well. All options worked and I plan on using this same product on other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Rear view Mirror Backup Screen
customer_reviews.text: Install was pretty straight forward. Just had to run wires behind trim panels and headliner for clean install. Temperature sensor seems to be a really sensitive to ambient temps around engine bay when sitting still and idling. But once your moving, seems to be pretty accurate. There is some adjustment in the software that can compensate some for this temperature. Compass seems to work decent once setup is complete. Follow the directions that come with unit. Auto dimming feature is a really nice upgrade for my 1998 Jeep. Pairing with a decent backup camera as well. The worst part about the unit is the install. Well at least hiding the wires behind the trim panels.
customer_reviews.author: Derick H.

customer_reviews.title: Mirror/Monitor Experiment
customer_reviews.text: The attached photos compare the image displayed on the Tailgaters Mirror/Monitor with that of the display of a Nissan Pathfinder. The images indicate that the Mirror/Monitor, with a pixel matrix of 480x272, shows the same information (a measuring stick) as a much higher resolution in-vehicle display (both sourced to a front-view camera of 720x540 pixel density). The difference of the two display devices is the clarity, which with this use is probably inconsequential.
customer_reviews.author: D. Erik the Red

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, great image.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Fit right onto original mount. Easy to install, if you are comfortable doing your own wiring. Needs to be paired with a backup camera (not included). Shows exterior temperature and compass in upper r/h corner.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Y.

customer_reviews.title: OEM function and look
customer_reviews.text: I have used 2 of these mirrors so far, on in a 99 f250, and one in a 97 ranger. In both applications I use this for the lower mount camera for hooking up to trailers and it works great. I like having the temperature and compass as well. Install is super easy, and the wiring in straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rewakowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror. Reasonably good video for the backup camera (also impacted by the camera itself purchased separately). Easy enough to install. The operating instructions are not the best and require you to resort to trial and error for adjusting the settings, calibrating the compass, etc. I contacted Master Tailgaters via their website prior to purchase with a question, but I never received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Craig R.

customer_reviews.title: Running the wires for power and the temp sensor on my Tahoe was easy, that will be different on other models
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box, read the instructions and in an hour replaced my old mirror. Running the wires for power and the temp sensor on my Tahoe was easy, that will be different on other models. My old mirror had compass and temp. The only original I could find cost twice as much and did not have backup cam ability. The mirror works great, looks like my old mirror, and have backup cam with just adding unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defect?
customer_reviews.text: I cannot seem to figure out how to adjust parking lines or have it display temperature. Read instructions multiple times. I wonder if I have a defective unit?? The picture quality and look of unit is top-notch though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L. Way

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Installed for my granddaughter who helped me with the installation. Trim removal tools help. Take your time for a clean installation and it will look factory. The picture is very clear
customer_reviews.author: Scubaldy

customer_reviews.title: Love this backup camera
customer_reviews.text: The screen is really good size and objects are very clear. This was a good purchase for my daughter's basic Honda FIT! Call around for installation if you don't do yourself. I got several different prices.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Bierle

customer_reviews.title: Time Consuming to Wire but Still Good!
customer_reviews.text: The one I got was refurbished, so the temperature gauge is not working. That said everything else works great, most importantly the auto dimming screen and the mirror it self to fight bright headlights. It is just the 3-4 hours of wiring that really sucks. I still would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the camera blends in with the mirror during daylight hours and I find it difficult to see what's behind me. If the manufacturer could increase the contrast, it would be a 5 star! The camera works great in the evening and night time because of the contrast. I like having the temp and compass available on the mirror for easy viewing. I did a lot of research for a backup camera mirror and feel I chose a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chesapeake07

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Customer service awesome! Very easy to use and just works! Rare to find something these days that works as intended!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. However, I recommend professional installation, unless you are VERY handy.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Kropp

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement mirror
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy and straightforward. Installed in a 2000 Silverado. Take your time and route the wires properly the first time. Auto-dimming, compass, and temp are working great so far. Have not gotten my backup camera installed yet but I tested the screen and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Compass spotty at best
customer_reviews.text: Installation was straight forward, given the directions were spotty at best. Come to find out, the directions that came in my box were different from the model I received. The compass calibration has not worked for me yet, found the instructions online (as they were not in the package), and still no avail. Disappointed as it took a decent amount of time to install.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice works very well looks just like it came from the factory I also installed the back up camera that was recommended by amazon when I bought the mirror it works great with the mirror
customer_reviews.author: crazyman123465

customer_reviews.title: An excellent quality fix for cars that lack back-up cameras.
customer_reviews.text: I added this, with an OEM camera to my 2011 RAV4. I works quite well and I am very pleased. It was very sensibly packaged and it has been very straightforward installation. The big problem, of course, is to route the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Directions on installation are vague at best.
customer_reviews.text: Not terribly clear on how to install.. a bunch of pictures, but not very detailed to the labeling on the wiring not came with.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great for upgrading a vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that allowed me to add cameras to my car without having to modifying my can bus system. The only thing I had to add to this was adapters to match my original VW mirror. Always test the operation before installing permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Powell Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Bad Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I Item works good, but the install instructions leave a lot to figure out. No mention of green wire or where to hook it up to. Took me a week to figure out. Changed review
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions to set the compass and temperature sensor was garbage. It somehow flickers from North to south. Also, no matter where I put the temperature sensor, the heat from the engine makes it off every time the car isn't moving.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great cost but make sure you know what you are doing on install. Overall great quality will install more my other cars
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Shepard

customer_reviews.title: The mirror is great. It's clear and has distance markers which are ...
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is great. It's clear and has distance markers which are so helpful. The compass was so easy to set. I did not use the temp gauge because my car has one! My installer said it was easy to install. I feel safer with my new backup camera. I love it..
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ginsberg

customer_reviews.title: OEM quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Would definitely purchase again. Camera display brightness is programmable.
customer_reviews.author: HSGandMS

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading an old Ford Truck, modernizing.
customer_reviews.text: After 27 years the old mirror was looking spotty. This new one is as good if not better then late models in today's cars. Installing took about an hour to route cabling for temp, camera and power. Operation of mirror has been flawless, cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G

customer_reviews.title: Good if it worked correctly ..
customer_reviews.text: Directions have no process of how to calibrate compass..compass shows every direction but North and east or northeast..very odd and tried to calibrate without success no way to contact manufacturers
customer_reviews.author: William E.

customer_reviews.title: Got the mirror installed and it is far better than the factory mirror I replaced
customer_reviews.text: Got the mirror installed and it is far better than the factory mirror I replaced. However, they forgot to mention that the mirror does not come with a camera. After getting the mirror installed, I ordered the camera. I have it but have not had time to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't change a thing. Temp, compas, display, fit and function - all perfect! Worth the $190 hands down.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend buying 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This camera is super clear, better than stock back up cameras I have seen in the past plus the compass and temperature gauge works perfect ....nice clean factory look as well..very pleased!👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great product. No instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very pleased with it, but no instructions on installation. Otherwise I'd give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick S.

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is everything it promises!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is phenomenal. Installed it in a car that did not have a smart mirror and it is every bit as good as a factory one would be. I plan to buy a second one for another vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Not the most reliable
customer_reviews.text: The image is reverse of what you see. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great to have all the features listed on this product
customer_reviews.text: Great to have all the features listed on this product. Backup display, dimming mirror, temp. and compass. Fits perfectly and so easy to install. Glad that I bought this one. I really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: David Quimayousie

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and OEM Look
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a back up camera monitor but didn't want anything that looked like an aftermarket add-on. This mirror is high quality and looks original to my car. The screen and mirror is bright, crisp and clear. Installation was straight forward with good instructions. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Vireak

customer_reviews.title: But other wise seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well was simple to install. It is bigger than original mirror ( wish it was a bit smaller). But other wise seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Baltzell

customer_reviews.title: Items showed up promptly, All items included in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Items showed up promptly, All items included in the kit that are needed. The cost of a standard replacement mirror is $50 dollars and for a few more dollars I now have auto dimming feature, back up camera, outside temperature reading and compass all in one unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Vanderbeck

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is pure crap hooked it all up and nothing at all only the degrees and compass works !
customer_reviews.author: kevin ardent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is a good quality item and and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror- easy install
customer_reviews.text: Mirror worked perfectly on my 2008 Ram pickup. Easy installation and looks great
customer_reviews.author: David Swart

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, original equipment look.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror has done everything it advertised. It was a simple solution for adding an LCD screen to my truck. I like items that look like original equipment. Perfect installation
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Giarnelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can not beat this for the money. Very nice and clear picture for the back up view. Very easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: earnhardtgm3

customer_reviews.title: Great overall product. I really appreciate the OEM look, and having the compass and temperature settings.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Comes with all the parts you need. One note I realized is that if you create changes from the settings menu but turn the car off it will go back to default settings. I guess nothing can be done about that. Overall great OEM look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Fizzel

customer_reviews.title: So far it's pretty nice except I haven't calibrated the compass portion of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2014 2500 Silverado Crew Cab to go with the tailgate handle camera. So far it's pretty nice except I haven't calibrated the compass portion of it yet. The reason why I am only giving the rear-view mirror 4 stars is because it sat lower than the factory. I would say a good 2-3 inches lower. Otherwise everything works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking unit with quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit with quality construction. Anxious to get it installed to see if the unit performs equally as well.
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: Stay tuned for follow up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a gift for my mother. She has a Solara convertible and it is extremely difficult to see out the rear window. She is getting older and needed a safe, easy to install camera system for use in reverse. I chose this based on average reviews, cost, and features. I cannot comment yet on the function of the product. This will be a Christmas gift, so I will follow up with a review once she has it installed and can give me her feedback.
customer_reviews.author: EJfen

customer_reviews.title: Great display.  Nice fit and finish.
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well. Can't even tell there is a backup display when the mirror is acting as a mirror and the display is very clear when backing up. It fit perfectly on the existing OEM mirror mount on our Toyota Sienna and looks like a factory install. My only negative comment would would the setup is a little un-intuitive and the instructions weren't much help (for example, you have to put the car into reverse to adjust the guides - no mention of this in the manual). That aside it really is a nice product and a great safety feature. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: very very happy with this product. i find myself using the compass and thermometer (which are both very accurate) SO often. the backup camera is very helpful...and something cool that i also show-off pretty much everytime I have someone in the car with me.
customer_reviews.author: zakeunc

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror and will be getting another for my other car! The automatic day to night dimming and display brightness are great features. I was concerned that the display may be washed out in bright sunlight but it is crisp and clear. The display size is on the smaller side but having it in the rear view mirror is so convenient. I highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: A very good mirror with great features. Quality made a easy to install and use. Just be careful taking off your original mirror. I snapped my windshield and it was a costly mistake to fix.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Quality monitor
customer_reviews.text: The rear view camera has a clear view and very well built. If you’re looking for a quality monitor at a good price this is it.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works perfectly, saved a lot of money doing it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Teddie W.

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Camera picture comes up almost instantly when Placed in reverse, no boot time what so ever. Compass and temp display are a nice addition since my truck had neither. the adjustable grid lines are also a very helpful feature. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Strietelmeier

customer_reviews.title: Great OEM replacement mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Great product cristal clear quality. Great OEM replacement mirror. For my 04 Rav4. Thanks master tailgaters. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Small Frog (Coqui)

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, the picture is bright and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Paul O.

customer_reviews.title: Not universal
customer_reviews.text: The display is quite adequate but it gets very hot if you leave it on for any length of time. The mirror does not come with a universal windshield adapter and it wouldn't fit the mount on a 2017 Ram 1500. I had to purchase two part mirror epoxy and attach the included "old style" mirror windshield post about three inches below the factory post.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C

product_meta.title: Master Tailgaters OEM Rear View Mirror with Ultra Bright 4.3" Auto Adjusting Brightness LCD + Auto Dimming Mirror + Compass & Temperature - Universal Fit (Complete Replacement)
feature_bullets: [SCREEN]: 4.3" TFT Ultra High Brightness LCD - Auto Adjusting Brightness with AUTO DIMMING MIRROR
LCD Display Automatically Turns On When Vehicle Put In Reverse
[MIRROR]: 4mm Thick Glass with Compass and Temperature + Remote
Plugs in to most Backup Cameras with RCA Inputs (Backup Camera Sold Separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars98 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
